column1: SCOTUS just ended the #2020Census early.  @realDonaldTrump’s obsession with stopping the census will have lasting effects for years to come.   Countless communities will be denied the federal funds needed to recover from the COVID-19 pandemic.  This will hurt a lot of people.

I’m shocked the President would abandon the American people in this time of crisis by ending #COVID19 relief negotiations.  210000 are dead. Families are suffering. Millions are unemployed. Rent is due.   The President can end this suffering. Why wait? https://t.co/lEOKKjRZ8h

I wish the President and First Lady a speedy and safe recovery.  This virus continues to be a threat we should all take seriously.  Remember to wear a mask wash your hands and continue practicing social distancing.  Together we can beat #COVID19.

Working-class families in our community have been hit hard by the COVID-19 pandemic.  These families need help now. This legislation will help struggling families survive.  The Senate must immediately take up this bill. My constituents cannot wait any longer. https://t.co/Zm9m7LM9m4
Neighbors helping neighbors during Covid 19: https://t.co/EUO7tmsy19

COVID-19 claimed another victim on Main Street in #Anaheim.  After 16 years of serving our community & training the #USA Olympic volleyball team American Sports Centers is closing their doors.  We must do more to help our struggling job creators & the people that depend on them.

President Trump just confirmed what many of us have suspected all along. He is defunding the US Post Office to prevent Americans from voting by mail this November.   All Americans have the right to vote without risking exposure to COVID-19. https://t.co/XbkcbsO0YR
The White House is already walking back the President’s COVID-19 executive orders.   Empty promises help no one.  Pass the #HeroesAct. https://t.co/JAu5cAkvbp
Congress passed the Heroes Act Covid - 19 assistance months ago.  It sits in the Senate. Let’s get it done.  Our small businesses are dying.  These jobs are not coming  back. https://t.co/PYJ0HXKugc

I sent a letter with 22 of my colleagues urging Speaker Pelosi to protect funding in the #HeroesAct for medical schools that serve diverse and underserved communities.  COVID-19 is devastating minority communities. We need doctors to fight back! https://t.co/XjJl2XywGo
Checking in on our forgotten heroes our frontline farm workers that continue working during Covid-19. https://t.co/1awOmZ7Rdy
Providing PPE to our frontline farm workers that are continuing to feed our families during  Covid-19. https://t.co/dOz9dWKsZS

If you lost your job because of the coronavirus pandemic you know how critical the extra $600 in federal unemployment is for you and your family.   Unfortunately this vital safety net is about to end because of the Senate's inaction.

Proud to be honored by @CALifeSciences.   Our life science firms are leading the world in medical research developing Covid-19 medicines and creating great paying jobs in Orange County.  It’s a privilege to work together & develop the tools of tomorrow here in OC. https://t.co/PtidHVktkB

While COVID-19 rages across the USA President Trump has:  ❌ Ended government-funded testing sites ❌ Denied critical science & repeated misinformation ❌ Filed to terminate the ACA permanently.  As usual the Administration is picking politics over solving the crisis upon us.

Today at noon I will be taking a moment of silence to remember the 100000 American lives lost to COVID-19.   If you are able join me and help keep the memories of those we’ve lost alive.   #DayOfMourning https://t.co/XV5IH144IS

🙌🏽 VICTORY!! 🙌🏽   My bill the Leave No Taxpayer Behind Act is included in The Heroes Act—the latest COVID-19 relief bill!  After being excluded from the CAREs Act taxpaying ITIN holders will finally have access to the resources they so desperately need.  Stay tuned!

I sent a letter w/ @RepJayapal @RepRaulGrijalva & 84 of our colleagues demanding @BetsyDeVosED include student immigrants in our coronavirus relief efforts.   COVID-19 does not differentiate between students & neither should the government.    Read more: https://t.co/5k5myXehXK

Despite my efforts to protect immigrant families Washington has deliberately excluded these taxpayers from coronavirus relief.  Thank you Gov @GavinNewsom for stepping in where the federal government failed and helping our families.  No one should be left out. https://t.co/fjhWemDZFd

Today @RepEBJ & I led 91 of our colleagues in denouncing the harmful health disparities faced by minorities.  With #COVID-19 disproportionally impacting people of color in the USA there has never been a more critical time to talk about health disparity.  https://t.co/zQzThYvgeL

Thank you Gov @GavinNewsom for stepping up for immigrants when others turn their backs.  I'm fighting in Congress to pass the Leave No Taxpayers Behind Act to ensure immigrants are included in federal COVID-19 relief.   In the meantime at least California will do what is right. https://t.co/ygCwngiDuC

While many of us sit at home these hardworking immigrants are still at work in our hospitals our fields and countless other industries. The coronavirus doesn’t care about a person’s wealth job or immigration status.

I just introduced the Leave No Taxpayer Behind Act because taxpaying immigrants were left out of the $2 trillion coronavirus relief bill. These taxpayers work in critical sectors of our economy like agriculture & contribute greatly to our country.

Today @RepJudyChu @RepRaulGrijalva & I introduced legislation to correct the injustice of excluding taxpaying immigrants from the CARES Act.   The coronavirus doesn’t care about a person’s wealth job or status. All taxpayers need assistance now. This bill ensures they get it.

Farmworkers fill our markets & dinner tables. They are essential to our economy & our nation.  Yet these taxpayers have been intentionally excluded from coronavirus relief efforts.  We depend on their work to feed our families. I won’t stop fighting until they are treated equally https://t.co/4pUV3kIiRO
COVID-19 testing in the USA has been unacceptably inaccessible and slow.   Things are finally starting to turn around 👉🏽 https://t.co/xbB3qSnWNz
TODAY @ 2 PM PT I’m hosting a #COVID19 Small Business Town Hall on Facebook Live.   Join us here: https://t.co/ScDtfJzQZY https://t.co/BrfTyk6fkg
My Coronavirus Town Hall is starting now! Join me: https://t.co/H0itYcApMH
TODAY @ 2 PM PT I’m hosting a #COVID19 Town Hall on Facebook Live.   Join us here: https://t.co/yvTxBftUye https://t.co/xUeaF61jee

@SpeakerPelosi just announced the @HouseDemocrats response to COVID-19:  🧪Tests will be available to all who need them—including the uninsured.    🍏Families & kids will receive food assistance.   💵Workers will have expanded unemployment benefits & paid sick days. https://t.co/2FGvYACZzb

I’m glad the @MLB is addressing coronavirus & postponing the season.  Earlier this week I asked the @Angels their plan for addressing coronavirus here in Orange County.  Keeping fans & players safe is important. Postponing the season is the right call. https://t.co/8XhiZR18ez

Deeply distributed to learn a @TSA officer has contracted coronavirus in the coarse of their duty. Our officers can’t keep us safe if they are sick and in quarantine.   .@DHS_Wolf owes @HomelandDems some answers on why TSA doesn’t have the protection they need.
I joined @OutFrontCNN to talk about coronavirus and what we’re doing to protect Americans.   Watch it here 👇🏽 https://t.co/XgGdc22z7g
I’ll be on @OutFrontCNN @ 7:05pm to talk about what @HomelandDems are doing to address coronavirus.   Tune in and get the fact. 📺

I am deeply concerned to learn that an LAX screener has contracted coronavirus. With this virus spreading by air it is imperative to protect our workers who are on the frontlines.   We all have a duty to detect control and slow the spread of all possible threats to our health. https://t.co/mIuDkypxGd

Sharing information is paramount to treating patients with coronavirus yet @CDCgov is withholding critical information from doctors & nurses working to keeping us safe.  I’m urging @SecAzar to step it up & get vital information to the health professionals on the frontlines. https://t.co/C6c9M0YhMP
Getting the facts and working together is critical for stopping coronavirus. I'm coordinating with @ochealth to protect residents and get the facts out. https://t.co/G4jEMevA2j
I am calling for an emergency Homeland Security hearing on addressing coronavirus and protecting the health and safety of the American people.
